Module lanat
Package lanat

Annotation Interface Argument.Define

Enclosing class:
Argument<Type extends ArgumentType<TInner>,TInner>
@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target(FIELD) public static @interface Argument.Define
Used in CommandTemplates to specify the properties of an argument belonging to the command.
See Also:
  • CommandTemplate

    • prefix

      @NotNull Argument.Prefix prefix
      Specifies the prefix character for this argument.

      By default, this is set to the value of Argument.Prefix.defaultPrefix.

      See Also:
      • Argument.setPrefix(Prefix)
      Default:
      DEFAULT

      boolean required
      See Also:

    • visible

      boolean visible
      See Also:
      • Argument.setVisible(boolean)
      Default:
      true

    • group

      @NotNull @NotNull String group
      The name of the group this argument will be added to; in the case the named group does not exist then it will be created. If multiple arguments have the same group name, they will be added to the same group.
      Default:
      ""
